mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select p.post_id as post_id, p.member_email as member_email, s.file_name as file_name, replace(s.upload_path, '\','/') as upload_path, s.uuid as uuid, row_number() over(partition by p.post_id order by p.post_id) as rn from post p, social s where p.post_id = s.post_id) where rn = 1)
